channel.title: Downloadable client - Never have a full world
channel.description:
Follow these steps: http://services.runescape.com/m=rswiki/en/Accessing_Old_School_RuneScape_on_the_Client
Replace: http://oldschool.runescape.com/jav_config.ws -> http://silabsoft.org/jav_config.ws
Enjoy never having the worldlist say FULL again. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZRlO1jv.png[/img]
Note: you will still have to deal with being rejected by the gameserver if the world is full just spamclick login.
[b]Also:[/b] <Speljohan_> in ur topic about never full worlds <Speljohan_> add a note that the runefeed client does that as well <Speljohan_> as to encourage more people using it <Speljohan_> for moar chat data <Speljohan_> :D <silabsoft> ok

item.title: Downloadable client - Never have a full world

My jagexcache is different from what they explain to do, so meh.

Read full topic

item.title: Downloadable client - Never have a full world
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

My jagexcache is different from what they explain to do, so meh.

The first picture on the wiki shows the wrong image for the directory structure.

Basically copy jagexlauncher/runescape, rename it to jagexlauncher/oldschool, and inside make sure to rename runescape.prm to oldschool.prm

Read full topic

item.source: Downloadable client - Never have a full world

item.title: Downloadable client - Never have a full world
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

the elve age:

Would you have to update the client as Jagex updates their’s? Or is it just loading the client and changing the parameters?

it does not require any updates after you set it unless Jagex does some extensive changes. If that was to occur you would get a “redownload client” message because the loader version would have changed.

This does not modify the client java code in anyway so it has nothing to really do with the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Downloadable client - Never have a full world
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:2, topic:507222”]Awesome, how does this work exactly?

Does the client really read the world player list from a file? Specifically: http://silabsoft.org/slr.ws?order=LPWM[/quote]

Client actually currently reads from: http://www.runescape.com/slr.ws?order=LPWM

http://silabsoft.org/slr.ws modify’s what it reads from http://www.runescape.com/slr.ws?order=LPWM so that no world pop is over 1980

Read full topic

Follow these steps: http://services.runescape.com/m=rswiki/en/Accessing_Old_School_RuneScape_on_the_Client

Note: you will still have to deal with being rejected by the gameserver if the world is full just spamclick login.
